text.p: Tencor Instruments and Uniphase Corp said Tencor's acquisition of Uniphase unit Ultrapointe Corp will not close before the end of December 1996, as originally anticipated.
Due to both companies' scheduled holiday breaks, due diligence was unable to be completed by year end.
Tencor and Uniphase said they both anticipate that they will resume negotiations following the holiday season with the mutual objective of completing this acquisition early in 1997.
